mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scenarios (bot_id, name, description, start_step_id, is_default, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{botId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{startStepId}, #{isDefault}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, bot_id, name, description, start_step_id, is_default, created_at, updated_at FROM scenarios WHERE bot_id = #{botId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE scenarios SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, start_step_id = #{startStepId}, is_default = #{isDefault}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
